verses.verse: <S%H2009>"How<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> you are, my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> <S%H2009>How<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> you are! Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are [like] <S%H3123>doves<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H1157><s%> your <S%H6777>veil;<s%> Your <S%H8181>hair<s%> is like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%> That have <S%H1570>descended<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

"Your <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of [newly] <S%H7094>shorn<s%> ewes <S%H7945>Which<s%> have <S%H5927>come<s%> up from [their] <S%H7367>washing,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of <S%H7945>which<s%> <S%H8382>bear<s%> <S%H8382>twins,<s%> And not <S%H369>one<s%> among them has <S%H9599>lost<s%> her <S%H9599>young.<s%>

"Your <S%H8193>lips<s%> are like a <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread,<s%> And your <S%H9245>mouth<s%> is <S%H5000>lovely.<s%> Your <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>slice<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H4480>Behind<s%> <S%H1157><s%> your <S%H6777>veil.<s%>

"Your <S%H6677>neck<s%> is like the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>Built<s%> with <S%H8530>rows<s%> of <S%H8530>stones,<s%> On which are <S%H8518>hung<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4043>shields,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the round <S%H7982>shields<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men.<s%>
"Your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are like <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6082>fawns,<s%> <S%H9639>Twins<s%> of a <S%H6646>gazelle,<s%> Which <S%H7462>feed<s%> among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>

<S%H5704>"Until<s%> the <S%H6315>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> When the <S%H6738>shadows<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> away, I will <S%H1980>go<s%> my <S%H1980>way<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> And to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%>
"You are <S%H3605>altogether<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful,<s%> my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H9249>blemish<s%> in you.

<S%H935>"[Come<s%>] with me from <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> [my] <S%H3618>bride,<s%> May you come with me from <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> <S%H7788>Journey<s%> <S%H7788>down<s%> from the <S%H7218>summit<s%> of <S%H549>Amana,<s%> From the <S%H7218>summit<s%> of <S%H8149>Senir<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> From the <S%H4585>dens<s%> of <S%H738>lions,<s%> From the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5246>leopards.<s%>

"You have made my <S%H3823>heart<s%> <S%H3823>beat<s%> <S%H3823>faster,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> [my] <S%H3618>bride;<s%> You have made my <S%H3823>heart<s%> <S%H3823>beat<s%> <S%H3823>faster<s%> with a <S%H259>single<s%> [glance] of your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> With a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H6060>strand<s%> of your <S%H9477>necklace.<s%>

<S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> is your <S%H1730>love,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> [my] <S%H3618>bride!<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> much <S%H2896>better<s%> is your <S%H1730>love<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> And the <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of your <S%H8081>oils<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H1314>spices!<s%>

"Your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> [my] <S%H3618>bride,<s%> <S%H5197>drip<s%> <S%H5317>honey;<s%> <S%H1706>Honey<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> are <S%H8478>under<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> And the <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of your <S%H8008>garments<s%> is like the <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

<S%H5373>Nard<s%> and <S%H3750>saffron,<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon,<s%> With <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> <S%H4753>Myrrh<s%> and <S%H174>aloes,<s%> <S%H5973>along<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>finest<s%> <S%H1314>spices.<s%>
"[You are] a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H4599>spring,<s%> A <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>fresh<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> And <S%H5140>streams<s%> [flowing] from <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>"

<S%H5782>"Awake,<s%> O <S%H6828>north<s%> [wind,] And <S%H935>come,<s%> [wind of] the <S%H8486>south;<s%> Make my <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H6315>breathe<s%> out [fragrance,] Let its <S%H1314>spices<s%> be <S%H5140>wafted<s%> abroad. May my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1588>garden<s%> And <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H4022>choice<s%> <S%H6529>fruits!<s%>"
